attributes.action: Declare 'God save the Queen' as the Royal anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'God save the Queen' should be declared as the Royal anthem as in Canada and Australia; letting 'Rule Britannia' become the British anthem and 'Land of hope and glory' the English anthem.  This would then come in line with the 'Flower of Scotland' in Scotland and 'Land of my fathers' in Wales.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
